version_description:
- Improvements and bug fixes
If you enjoy using LaunchPad, please take a minute to leave a nice review. It really helps.

Here's what's new in 19.0.0:
- Added App Library for My Apps section; now you can add featured apps exactly like on the web app;
- Bug fixes, stability fixes and app optimizations;

Release Notes:
-Added switch profile feature similar to the web app;
-Fixed RDP (Microsoft Office) apps;
-Bug fixes and UI improvements;

Release Notes:
-Added the password locker feature similar to the web app;
-Bug fixes and improvements;
Fixed the login with Face
Bug fixes and optimizations
Fixed the login with Face

-a NEW DESIGN that's going to make the app much easier and fun to use
-a NEW method for LOCATING YOUR SCHOOL even faster than before
-improved user experience
-bug fixing and optimizations
Bug fixes and improvements.

-added the Notifications feature similar to the web app
-added Authentication through your mobile authenticator application of choice
-bug fixing and improvements
Bug fixes and optimizations
Bug fixing and optimizations

-NEW feature for iOS 12+ devices: AutoFill your ClassLink passwords directly from the iOS keyboard
-Bug fixing and optimizations
AutoFill bug fixes and improvements

Added App Expiry and 2 Factor Authentication for apps inside My Apps
Bug fixing and improvements

NEW feature: Auto Launch
NEW design for the Active Apps section
To be edited from App Store Connect.

Tips for using the AutoFill feature
Bug fixes and optimizations

PDFs can now be easily opened and printed from the app

Bug fixes and improvements to My Files
This update includes ADFS login fixes for iOS 9

Added session logout handling: get notified when you end your mobile session from the web application
Bug fixes and improvements to My Files: ClassLink Drive
Added DUO support for 2 Factor Authentication
Login bug fixes
Bug fixes and optimizations
Fixed STMath app

Added TMS login support on the ClassLink Launchpad generic login
Partially redesigned the My Apps and Settings sections
Bug fixing and optimizations

Fixed 2FA with images for TMS login
Fixed crash caused by not being able to use DUO push 2FA by TMS users - the feature will be available in following updates
Bug fixes for the Favorites section

NEW design for app and folder options
Fixed app browser not resizing after changing orientation on iPads

Fixed PDFs not opening inside McGraw Hill ConnectED app

Solved app crashes

Fixed STMath app with ADFS

Added My Backpack

Added support for ADFS 2.0
My Backpack bug fixes
Added full support for split view usage
Other minor bug fixes and optimizations

Login flow optimizations
Bug fixes on Reset Password and My Backpack section

We fixed them:

- Notifications list not showing up when you have new messages? Done.
- Mobile Locker extension crashes when you try to add new lockers? Not anymore.
- App randomly crashes when you try to log in with QuickCards? You might not
Added the Discussions section to My Backpack

The following were fixed in this version:

- minor login bugs
- crashes inside the Autofill section (Mobile Password Locker)
- issues with the Renaissance Student SSO app

Enjoying LaunchPad? Leave a review, it really helps.

In this version we fixed the crashes that were happening during the login process.


Enjoying LaunchPad? Leave a review, it really helps.
